dg:extension.desc: Commands to change how text is typed in dialog.

dg:cmd.name: typespeed
dg:cmd.desc: Set typing duration to [speed]. 0 is instant.

dg:cmd.name: soundskip
dg:cmd.desc: Skip [numToSkip] characters for the typing sound instead of playing it for every character.

field.hint: A list of sounds to randomly pick from for each Type Sound.
field.label: Default Random Type Sounds
field.name: defaultRandomTypeSounds

field.hint: Number of characters to skip for playing Type Sound.
field.label: Type Sound Character Skip
field.name: characterSkipSFX
